channel.title: ragasvara on Mohit Khodidas

item.title: A Thought on Raga Svara
item.description: We build institutions. Sometimes I wonder why? The question whether it makes “business” sense does not appeal to me. I cannot think in traditional entrepreneurial terms (not proud of the fact). What we are making is a place of extraordinary experience. There are many mental frameworks that I use in thinking about the institutions that we build. One of the frameworks is prioritising LESS but GREAT over MORE and FLIMSY. Among the very few businessmen/entrepreneurs that I admire is Yvon Chouinard of Patagonia.
